entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 7:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
